title: Taloola Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Quaint, eccentric cafe and tea shop is located in the Olde Walkerville area of Windsor along the Detroit River. Serves soups, sandwiches, salads, rice bowls, specialty coffees, wine and beer. Has vegan desserts. Special raw food menu offered on Wednesday. Uses many local, healthy, organic ingredients.
